H0.text: What is now Africa's biggest country in terms of land area after the split of Sudan. Algeria

H1.text: What is now Africa's biggest country in terms of land area after the split of Sudan. Democratic Republic of the Congo

H2.text: What is now Africa's biggest country in terms of land area after the split of Sudan. Sudan

H3.text: What is now Africa's biggest country in terms of land area after the split of Sudan. Dzayer

A4.text: Since the 2011 breakup of Sudan, and the creation of South Sudan, Algeria has been the largest country in Africa.

A5.text: Algeria is the largest country in Africa and the tenth-largest country in the world by land area.
